item.title: Mentioned by Kingston Herald
item.description:
Trudeau Announces Multiple Roles for Kingston MP Ted Hsu
M.P. Ted Hsu has posted a list of his new responsibilities in the Liberal caucus as announced by Liberal party leader, Justin Trudeau. Hsu, the Federal member of parliament for Kingston & The Islands, not only retained the critic role he inherited from Trudeau ...
